title: League Client wont launch
body:
I installed League of Legends and played for a while, and now when ever I want to play my client wont launch. I have to uninstall and re-install every time I want to play. Then only it will open once until I close it and wont open again upon trying to relaunch it. Can anyone help me with this issue.
I am running league on Windows 10, and has all latest updates.

replies.body:
A common reason why League won't open is due to not being assigned the right system permissions to run. There are a lot of files and software packages League relies on that are located outside of the League directory. In order to access and interact with these files and packages, League requires proper system permissions. Our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) will provide some good starting steps to ensure that League can run. 

Let me know if this helps.
I fixed all of the systems permission and it still didnt work, I tried downloading and running as an administrator and still nothing. I have have nothing left to try.

If the admin launcher *Rineyy* mentioned doesn't work, then I recommend reaching out to our tech specialists by [submitting a ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) If you run a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) and attach them to your ticket, our techs will have the context necessary to resolve this issue for good.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I tried everything you guys have told me and nothing happened. Now its telling me that there is a problem, saying "Failure to launch RADS\system_user_kernel.exe

I wasn't able to find a support ticket for you. Did you already submit one and get assigned to a tech specialist? If not, definitely submit a ticket with logs so we can instigate and resolve this with you.
OK I submitted a ticket how long do you think it will take to get solved

That's impossible for me to estimate. This can vary, depending on how many tickets the tech team has in their queue, what steps need to be taken to resolve it, and the time it takes to complete the steps.
Go to Local Disk (C) > Riot Games > League of Legends > lol.launcher.admin.
